docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The disastrous Alaska oil spill, for which corporate apologies and assurances are poor compensation, is scarcely a cloud with a silver lining. It may provide a new impetus for environmental protection and restoration, but the damage done by the Exxon Valdez and its masters will have been done, and much of it will never be undone.
